channel.title: [PI] Items Kept on Death
channel.description:
How do I make it so instead of using the prices.txt to determine what is kept, it uses the alch price in item.cfg ?
REP+ for help :D

item.title: [PI] Items Kept on Death
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

[quote=“rash, post:6, topic:378550”][quote author=Football1smylife link=topic=474418.msg3469008#msg3469008 date=1295148233]
The alch price is determined in the item.cfg file…

Except this is in the high alch method:

				c.getItems().addItem(995, (int)(c.getShops().getItemShopValue(itemId)*.75));

That makes me wonder why the high alch price is even in the item.cfg file…
[/quote]

Is’nt that getting the alch price from the Shop price?[/quote]

That’s what it seems like to me. It seems as if the alch price is 3/4 of the shop price. How about this… How do I make the shop price be determined in the item.cfg class instead of the prices.txt document… I have no idea what the first 2 numbers are for in the item.cfg class now.

Read full topic

Alright then. I need it to be the alch price because I made a PK point shop and I had to make the prices.txt for an AGS 300. Now everything protects over an AGS.
